section.title: Viewing User Information for a Virtual Machine or Template
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine's SmartState Analysis feature returns user information. Drill into the user to get details on the users account, including group memberships.

step.para: Click the accordion for the item to view user information.
Click on the item to view its Summary.
From the Security section of the Virtual Machine Summary, click Users.
Click the user to view details.
